title: Pixel 3 shuts off approx. 3 minutes after unplugging from charger, won't turn back on
content:
This started happening randomly.
My Pixel now will shut off approx. 3 minutes after unplugging, even if it's fully charged.

This persists in safe mode and after factory reset.

I left it in my pocket turned off with 90% battery and the battery drained.

it also works just fine when plugged in.
